text: Joshua Then and Now is a 1985 Canadian drama movie directed by Ted Kotcheff and based on the novel by Mordecai Richler. It stars James Woods, Gabrielle Lazure, Alan Arkin, Michael Sarrazin, Alan Scarfe, Linda Sorenson, Alexander Knox, Robert Joy, Harvey Atkin, Paul Hecht and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1985 drama movies Category:1980s biographical movies Category:Canadian biographical movies Category:Canadian drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Ted Kotcheff
title: Joshua Then and Now (movie)
